scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run build:types && npm run build:js
scripts.patch:solo: npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.patch:full: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'patch' && npm run patch:solo
scripts.minor:solo: npm version minor && npm publish && git push
scripts.minor:full: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'minor' && npm run minor:solo
scripts.major: echo "You can't run major updates like this"
